remarks: Properties that determine a poset (implicit structure version). (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2011.)
statement:
isposi.k $e |- K e. _V $.
isposi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isposi.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
isposi.1 $e |- ( x e. B -> x .<_ x ) $.
isposi.2 $e |- ( ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> ( ( x .<_ y /\ y .<_ x ) -> x = y ) ) $.
isposi.3 $e |- ( ( x e. B /\ y e. B /\ z e. B ) -> ( ( x .<_ y /\ y .<_ z ) -> x .<_ z ) ) $.
isposi $p |- K e. Poset $.
$d .<_ x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
